00069 typedef struct IPListNode
00070 {
00071       INT16 sGridNo;
00072       struct IPListNode *next;
00073 }IPListNode;
00074 
00075 IPListNode *pIPHead = NULL;
00076 
00077 IPListNode *gpCurrItemPoolNode = NULL;
00078 ITEM_POOL *gpItemPool = NULL;
00079 
00080 void BuildItemPoolList()
00081 {
00082       ITEM_POOL *temp;
00083       IPListNode *tail;
00084       UINT16 i;
00085       KillItemPoolList();
00086       for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00087       {
00088             if( GetItemPool( i, &temp , 0) )
00089             {
00090                   if( !pIPHead )
00091                   {
00092                         pIPHead = (IPListNode*)MemAlloc( sizeof( IPListNode ) );
00093                         Assert( pIPHead );
00094                         tail = pIPHead;
00095                   }
00096                   else
00097                   {
00098                         tail->next = (IPListNode*)MemAlloc( sizeof( IPListNode ) );
00099                         Assert( tail->next );
00100                         tail = tail->next;
00101                   }
00102                   ShowItemCursor( i );
00103                   tail->sGridNo = i;
00104                   tail->next = NULL;
00105             }
00106       }
00107       gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPHead;
00108       SpecifyItemToEdit( NULL, -1 );
00109 }
00110 
00111 void KillItemPoolList()
00112 {
00113       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
00114       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
00115       while( pIPCurr )
00116       {
00117             HideItemCursor( pIPCurr->sGridNo );
00118             pIPHead = pIPHead->next;
00119             MemFree( pIPCurr );
00120             pIPCurr = pIPHead;
00121       }
00122       pIPHead = NULL;
00123 }

00129 //Does some precalculations regarding the number of each item type, so that it
00130 //isn't calculated every time a player changes categories.
00131 void EntryInitEditorItemsInfo()
00132 {
00133       INT32 i;
00134       INVTYPE *item;
00135       eInfo.uiBuffer = 0;
00136       eInfo.fKill = 0;
00137       eInfo.fActive = 0;
00138       eInfo.sWidth = 0;
00139       eInfo.sHeight = 0;
00140       eInfo.sScrollIndex = 0;
00141       eInfo.sSelItemIndex = 0;
00142       eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex = -1;
00143       eInfo.sNumItems = 0;
00144       eInfo.pusItemIndex = NULL;
00145       if( eInfo.fGameInit )
00146       { //This only gets called one time in game execution.
00147             memset( &eInfo, 0, sizeof( EditorItemsInfo ) );
00148             eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex = -1;
00149             eInfo.uiItemType = TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS;
00150             //Pre-calculate the number of each item type.
00151             eInfo.sNumTriggers = NUMBER_TRIGGERS;
00152             for( i=0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
00153             {
00154                   if ( Item[i].usItemClass  == 0 )
00155                         break;
00156                   item = &Item[i];
00157                   //if( Item[i].fFlags & ITEM_NOT_EDITOR )
00158                   //    continue;
00159                   if( i == SWITCH || i == ACTION_ITEM )
00160                   {
00161 
00162                   }
00163                   else switch( item->usItemClass )
00164                   {
00165                         case IC_GUN:
00166                         case IC_BLADE:
00167                         case IC_THROWN:
00168                         case IC_LAUNCHER:
00169                         case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
00170                               eInfo.sNumWeapons++;
00171                               break;
00172                         case IC_PUNCH:
00173                               if ( i != NOTHING )
00174                               {
00175                                     eInfo.sNumWeapons++;
00176                               }
00177                               break;
00178                         case IC_AMMO:
00179                               eInfo.sNumAmmo++;
00180                               break;
00181                         case IC_ARMOUR:
00182                               eInfo.sNumArmour++;
00183                               break;
00184                         case IC_GRENADE:
00185                         case IC_BOMB:
00186                               eInfo.sNumExplosives++;
00187                               break;
00188                         case IC_MEDKIT:
00189                         case IC_KIT:
00190                         case IC_FACE:
00191                         case IC_MISC:
00192                         case IC_MONEY:
00193                               if( eInfo.sNumEquipment1 < 30 )
00194                                     eInfo.sNumEquipment1++;
00195                               else if( eInfo.sNumEquipment2 < 30 )
00196                                     eInfo.sNumEquipment2++;
00197                               else
00198                                     eInfo.sNumEquipment3++;
00199                               break;
00200                         //case IC_KEY:
00201                         //    eInfo.sNumKeys++;
00202                         //    break;
00203                   }
00204             }
00205             eInfo.sNumKeys = NUM_KEYS;
00206       }
00207 }

00209 void InitEditorItemsInfo(UINT32 uiItemType)
00210 {
00211       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00212       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00213       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES, uiDestPitchBYTES;
00214       INVTYPE *item;
00215       SGPRect     SaveRect, NewRect;
00216       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00217       UINT32 uiVideoObjectIndex;
00218       UINT16 usUselessWidth, usUselessHeight;
00219       INT16 sWidth, sOffset, sStart;
00220       INT16 i, x, y;
00221       UINT16 usCounter;
00222       INT16 pStr[ 100 ];//, pStr2[ 100 ];
00223       UINT16 pItemName[SIZE_ITEM_NAME];
00224       UINT8                               ubBitDepth;
00225       BOOLEAN fTypeMatch;
00226       INT32 iEquipCount = 0;
00227 
00228       // Check to make sure that there isn't already a valid eInfo
00229       if( eInfo.fActive )
00230       {
00231             if( eInfo.uiItemType == uiItemType )
00232             {     //User clicked on the same item classification -- ignore
00233                   return;
00234             }
00235             else
00236             {     //User selected a different item classification -- delete it first.
00237                   ClearEditorItemsInfo();
00238                   ClearTaskbarRegion( 100, 360, 480, 440 ); 
00239             }
00240       }
00241       else
00242       {
00243             //Clear the menu area, so that the buffer doesn't get corrupted.
00244             ClearTaskbarRegion( 100, 360, 480, 440 ); 
00245       }
00246       EnableEditorRegion( ITEM_REGION_ID );
00247       
00248       eInfo.uiItemType = uiItemType;
00249       eInfo.fActive = TRUE;
00250       //Begin initialization of data.
00251       switch(uiItemType)
00252       {
00253             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS:
00254                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumWeapons;
00255                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveWeaponsScrollIndex;
00256                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelWeaponsIndex;
00257                   break;
00258             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_AMMO:
00259                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumAmmo;
00260                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveAmmoScrollIndex;
00261                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelAmmoIndex;
00262                   break;
00263             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_ARMOUR:
00264                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumArmour;
00265                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveArmourScrollIndex;
00266                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelArmourIndex;
00267                   break;
00268             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EXPLOSIVES:
00269                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumExplosives;
00270                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveExplosivesScrollIndex;
00271                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelExplosivesIndex;
00272                   break;
00273             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT1:
00274                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumEquipment1;
00275                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveEquipment1ScrollIndex;
00276                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment1Index;
00277                   break;
00278             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT2:
00279                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumEquipment2;
00280                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveEquipment2ScrollIndex;
00281                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment2Index;
00282                   break;
00283             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT3:
00284                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumEquipment3;
00285                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveEquipment3ScrollIndex;
00286                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment3Index;
00287                   break;
00288             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS:
00289                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumTriggers;
00290                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveTriggersScrollIndex;
00291                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelTriggersIndex;
00292                   break;
00293             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS:
00294                   eInfo.sNumItems = eInfo.sNumKeys;
00295                   eInfo.sScrollIndex = eInfo.sSaveKeysScrollIndex;
00296                   eInfo.sSelItemIndex = eInfo.sSaveSelKeysIndex;
00297                   break;
00298             default:
00299                   //error
00300                   return;
00301       }
00302       //Allocate memory to store all the item pointers.
00303       eInfo.pusItemIndex = (UINT16*)MemAlloc( sizeof(UINT16) * eInfo.sNumItems );
00304 
00305       //Disable the appropriate scroll buttons based on the saved scroll index if applicable
00306       //Left most scroll position
00307       DetermineItemsScrolling();
00308       //calculate the width of the buffer based on the number of items.
00309       //every pair of items (odd rounded up) requires 60 pixels for width.
00310       //the minimum buffer size is 420.  Height is always 80 pixels.
00311       eInfo.sWidth = (eInfo.sNumItems > 12) ? ((eInfo.sNumItems+1)/2)*60 : 360;
00312       eInfo.sHeight = 80;
00313       // Create item buffer
00314       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usUselessWidth, &usUselessHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00315       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00316       vs_desc.usWidth = eInfo.sWidth;
00317       vs_desc.usHeight = eInfo.sHeight;
00318       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
00319 
00320       //!!!Memory check.  Create the item buffer
00321       if(!AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &eInfo.uiBuffer ))
00322       {
00323             eInfo.fKill = TRUE;
00324             eInfo.fActive = FALSE;
00325             return;
00326       }
00327 
00328       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(eInfo.uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00329       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00330 
00331       //copy a blank chunk of the editor interface to the new buffer.
00332       for( i=0; i<eInfo.sWidth; i+=60 )
00333       {
00334             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00335                   (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES, 0+i, 0, 100, 360, 60, 80 );
00336       }
00337       
00338       UnLockVideoSurface(eInfo.uiBuffer);
00339       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00340 
00341       x = 0;
00342       y = 0;
00343       usCounter = 0;
00344       NewRect.iTop = 0;
00345       NewRect.iBottom = eInfo.sHeight;
00346       NewRect.iLeft = 0;
00347       NewRect.iRight = eInfo.sWidth;
00348       GetClippingRect(&SaveRect);
00349       SetClippingRect(&NewRect);
00350       if( eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS )
00351       { //Keys use a totally different method for determining
00352             for( i = 0; i < eInfo.sNumItems; i++ )
00353             {
00354                   item = &Item[ KeyTable[ 0 ].usItem + LockTable[ i ].usKeyItem ];
00355                   uiVideoObjectIndex = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( item );
00356                   GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObjectIndex );
00357 
00358                   //Store these item pointers for later when rendering selected items.
00359                   eInfo.pusItemIndex[i] = KeyTable[ 0 ].usItem + LockTable[ i ].usKeyItem;
00360 
00361                   SetFont(SMALLCOMPFONT);
00362                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
00363                   SetFontDestBuffer( eInfo.uiBuffer, 0, 0, eInfo.sWidth, eInfo.sHeight, FALSE );
00364 
00365                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"%S", LockTable[ i ].ubEditorName );
00366                   DisplayWrappedString(x, (UINT16)(y+25), 60, 2, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_WHITE, (STR16) pStr, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00367 
00368                   //Calculate the center position of the graphic in a 60 pixel wide area.
00369                   sWidth = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].usWidth;
00370                   sOffset = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].sOffsetX;
00371                   sStart = x + (60 - sWidth - sOffset*2) / 2;
00372 
00373                   BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( eInfo.uiBuffer, uiVideoObjectIndex, item->ubGraphicNum, sStart, y+2, 0, FALSE );
00374                   //cycle through the various slot positions (0,0), (0,40), (60,0), (60,40), (120,0)...
00375                   if( y == 0 )
00376                   {
00377                         y = 40;
00378                   }
00379                   else
00380                   {
00381                         y = 0;
00382                         x += 60;
00383                   }
00384             }
00385       }
00386       else for( i = 0; i < eInfo.sNumItems; i++ )
00387       {
00388 
00389             fTypeMatch = FALSE;
00390             while( usCounter<MAXITEMS && !fTypeMatch )
00391             {
00392                   if ( Item[usCounter].usItemClass  == 0 )
00393                         break;
00394                   item = &Item[usCounter];
00395                   //if( Item[usCounter].fFlags & ITEM_NOT_EDITOR )
00396                   {
00397                   //    usCounter++;
00398                   //    continue;
00399                   }
00400                   if( eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS )
00401                   {
00402                         if( i < PRESSURE_ACTION_ID )
00403                               usCounter = ( i % 2 ) ? ACTION_ITEM : SWITCH;
00404                         else
00405                               usCounter = ACTION_ITEM;
00406                         fTypeMatch = TRUE;
00407                         item = &Item[usCounter];
00408                   }
00409                   else switch( item->usItemClass )
00410                   {
00411                         case IC_GUN:
00412                         case IC_BLADE:
00413                         case IC_LAUNCHER:
00414                         case IC_THROWN:
00415                         case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
00416                               fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS;
00417                               break;
00418                         case IC_PUNCH:
00419                               if ( i != NOTHING )
00420                               {
00421                                     fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS;
00422                               }
00423                               else
00424                               {
00425                                     fTypeMatch = FALSE;
00426                               }
00427                               break;
00428                         case IC_AMMO:
00429                               fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_AMMO;
00430                               break;
00431                         case IC_ARMOUR:
00432                               fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_ARMOUR;
00433                               break;
00434                         case IC_GRENADE:
00435                         case IC_BOMB:
00436                               fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EXPLOSIVES;
00437                               break;
00438                         case IC_MEDKIT:
00439                         case IC_KIT:
00440                         case IC_FACE:
00441                         case IC_MISC:
00442                         case IC_MONEY:
00443                               if( usCounter == ACTION_ITEM || usCounter == SWITCH )
00444                                     break;
00445                               if( iEquipCount < 30 )
00446                                     fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT1;
00447                               else if( iEquipCount < 60 )
00448                                     fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT2;
00449                               else
00450                                     fTypeMatch = eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT3;
00451                               iEquipCount++;
00452                               break;
00453                   }
00454                   if( fTypeMatch )
00455                   {
00456 
00457                         uiVideoObjectIndex = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( item );
00458                         GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObjectIndex );
00459 
00460                         //Store these item pointers for later when rendering selected items.
00461                         eInfo.pusItemIndex[i] = usCounter;
00462 
00463                         SetFont(SMALLCOMPFONT);
00464                         SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE );
00465                         SetFontDestBuffer( eInfo.uiBuffer, 0, 0, eInfo.sWidth, eInfo.sHeight, FALSE );
00466 
00467 
00468                         if( eInfo.uiItemType != TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS )
00469                         {
00470                               LoadItemInfo( usCounter, pItemName, NULL );
00471                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"%s", pItemName );
00472                         }
00473                         else
00474                         {
00475                               if( i == PRESSURE_ACTION_ID )
00476                               {
00477                                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Pressure Action" );
00478                               }
00479                               else if( i < 2 )
00480                               {
00481                                     if( usCounter == SWITCH )
00482                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Trigger1" );
00483                                     else
00484                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Action1" );
00485                               }
00486                               else if( i < 4 )
00487                               {
00488                                     if( usCounter == SWITCH )
00489                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Trigger2" );
00490                                     else
00491                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Action2" );
00492                               }
00493                               else if( i < 6 )
00494                               {
00495                                     if( usCounter == SWITCH )
00496                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Trigger3" );
00497                                     else
00498                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Panic Action3" );
00499                               }
00500                               else
00501                               {
00502                                     if( usCounter == SWITCH )
00503                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Trigger%d", (i-4)/2 );
00504                                     else
00505                                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"Action%d", (i-4)/2 );
00506                               }
00507                         }
00508                         DisplayWrappedString(x, (UINT16)(y+25), 60, 2, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_WHITE, (STR16)pStr, FONT_BLACK, TRUE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00509 
00510                         //Calculate the center position of the graphic in a 60 pixel wide area.
00511                         sWidth = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].usWidth;
00512                         sOffset = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].sOffsetX;
00513                         sStart = x + (60 - sWidth - sOffset*2) / 2;
00514 
00515                         if( sWidth )
00516                         {
00517                               BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( eInfo.uiBuffer, uiVideoObjectIndex, item->ubGraphicNum, sStart, y+2, 0, FALSE );
00518                         }
00519                         //cycle through the various slot positions (0,0), (0,40), (60,0), (60,40), (120,0)...
00520                         if( y == 0 )
00521                         {
00522                               y = 40;
00523                         }
00524                         else
00525                         {
00526                               y = 0;
00527                               x += 60;
00528                         }
00529                   }
00530                   usCounter++;
00531             }
00532       }
00533       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00534       SetClippingRect(&SaveRect);
00535       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00536 }
00537 
00538 void DetermineItemsScrolling()
00539 {
00540       if( !eInfo.sScrollIndex )
00541             DisableEditorButton( ITEMS_LEFTSCROLL );
00542       else
00543             EnableEditorButton( ITEMS_LEFTSCROLL );
00544       //Right most scroll position.  Calculated by taking every pair of numItems rounded up,
00545       //and subtracting 7 (because a scroll index 0 is disabled if there are <=12 items,
00546       //index 1 for <=14 items, index 2 for <=16 items...
00547       if( eInfo.sScrollIndex == max( ((eInfo.sNumItems+1)/2)-6, 0 ) )
00548             DisableEditorButton( ITEMS_RIGHTSCROLL );
00549       else
00550             EnableEditorButton( ITEMS_RIGHTSCROLL );
00551 }
00552 
00553 void RenderEditorItemsInfo()
00554 {
00555       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00556       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES, uiDestPitchBYTES;
00557       INVTYPE *item;
00558       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00559       UINT32 uiVideoObjectIndex;
00560       INT16 i;
00561       INT16 minIndex, maxIndex;
00562       INT16 sWidth, sOffset, sStart, x, y;
00563       UINT16 usNumItems;
00564       UINT16 usQuantity;
00565 
00566       if(!eInfo.fActive)
00567       {
00568             return;
00569       }
00570       if( gusMouseXPos < 110 || gusMouseXPos > 480 || gusMouseYPos < 360 || gusMouseYPos > 440 )
00571       { //Mouse has moved out of the items display region -- so nothing can be highlighted.
00572             eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex = -1;
00573       }
00574       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00575       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(eInfo.uiBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00576 
00577       //copy the items buffer to the editor bar
00578       Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00579                         (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES, 110, 360, 60*eInfo.sScrollIndex, 0, 360, 80 );
00580 
00581       UnLockVideoSurface(eInfo.uiBuffer);
00582       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00583 
00584       //calculate the min and max index that is currently shown.  This determines
00585       //if the highlighted and/or selected items are drawn with the outlines.
00586       minIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex * 2;
00587       maxIndex = minIndex + 11;
00588 
00589       //draw the hilighted item if applicable.
00590       if( eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex >= minIndex && eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex <= maxIndex )
00591       {
00592             if( eInfo.pusItemIndex )
00593             {
00594                   item = &Item[eInfo.pusItemIndex[eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex]];
00595                   uiVideoObjectIndex = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( item );
00596                   GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObjectIndex );
00597                   x = (eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex/2 - eInfo.sScrollIndex)*60 + 110;
00598                   y = 360 + (eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex % 2) * 40;
00599                   sWidth = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].usWidth;
00600                   sOffset = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].sOffsetX;
00601                   sStart = x + (60 - sWidth - sOffset*2) / 2;
00602                   if( sWidth )
00603                   {
00604                         BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiVideoObjectIndex, item->ubGraphicNum, sStart, y+2, Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 250, 0)), TRUE );
00605                   }
00606             }
00607       }
00608       //draw the selected item
00609       if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex >= minIndex && eInfo.sSelItemIndex <= maxIndex )
00610       {
00611             if( eInfo.pusItemIndex )
00612             {
00613                   item = &Item[eInfo.pusItemIndex[eInfo.sSelItemIndex]];
00614                   uiVideoObjectIndex = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( item );
00615                   GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiVideoObjectIndex );
00616                   x = (eInfo.sSelItemIndex/2 - eInfo.sScrollIndex)*60 + 110;
00617                   y = 360 + (eInfo.sSelItemIndex % 2) * 40;
00618                   sWidth = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].usWidth;
00619                   sOffset = hVObject->pETRLEObject[item->ubGraphicNum].sOffsetX;
00620                   sStart = x + (60 - sWidth - sOffset*2) / 2;
00621                   if( sWidth )
00622                   {
00623                         BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiVideoObjectIndex, item->ubGraphicNum, sStart, y+2, Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 0, 0)), TRUE );
00624                   }
00625             }
00626       }
00627       //draw the numbers of each visible item that currently resides in the world.
00628       maxIndex = min( maxIndex, eInfo.sNumItems-1 );
00629       for( i = minIndex; i <= maxIndex; i++ )
00630       {
00631             usNumItems = CountNumberOfEditorPlacementsInWorld( i, &usQuantity );
00632             if( usNumItems )
00633             {
00634                   x = (i/2 - eInfo.sScrollIndex)*60 + 110;
00635                   y = 360 + (i % 2) * 40;
00636                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00637                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00638                   SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00639                   if( usNumItems == usQuantity )
00640                         mprintf( x + 12, y + 4, L"%d", usNumItems );
00641                   else
00642                         mprintf( x + 12, y + 4, L"%d(%d)", usNumItems, usQuantity );
00643             }
00644       }
00645 }
00646 
00647 void ClearEditorItemsInfo()
00648 {
00649       if( eInfo.uiBuffer )
00650       {
00651             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( eInfo.uiBuffer );
00652             eInfo.uiBuffer = 0;
00653       }
00654       if( eInfo.pusItemIndex )
00655       {
00656             MemFree( eInfo.pusItemIndex );
00657             eInfo.pusItemIndex = NULL;
00658       }
00659       DisableEditorRegion( ITEM_REGION_ID );
00660       eInfo.fKill = 0;
00661       eInfo.fActive = 0;
00662       eInfo.sWidth = 0;
00663       eInfo.sHeight = 0;
00664       eInfo.sNumItems = 0;
00665       //save the highlighted selections
00666       switch( eInfo.uiItemType )
00667       {
00668             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_WEAPONS:
00669                   eInfo.sSaveSelWeaponsIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00670                   eInfo.sSaveWeaponsScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00671                   break;
00672             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_AMMO:
00673                   eInfo.sSaveSelAmmoIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00674                   eInfo.sSaveAmmoScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00675                   break;
00676             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_ARMOUR:
00677                   eInfo.sSaveSelArmourIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00678                   eInfo.sSaveArmourScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00679                   break;
00680             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EXPLOSIVES:
00681                   eInfo.sSaveSelExplosivesIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00682                   eInfo.sSaveExplosivesScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00683                   break;
00684             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT1:
00685                   eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment1Index = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00686                   eInfo.sSaveEquipment1ScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00687                   break;
00688             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT2:
00689                   eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment2Index = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00690                   eInfo.sSaveEquipment2ScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00691                   break;
00692             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_EQUIPMENT3:
00693                   eInfo.sSaveSelEquipment3Index = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00694                   eInfo.sSaveEquipment3ScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00695                   break;
00696             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS:
00697                   eInfo.sSaveSelTriggersIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00698                   eInfo.sSaveTriggersScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00699                   break;
00700             case TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS:
00701                   eInfo.sSaveSelKeysIndex = eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
00702                   eInfo.sSaveKeysScrollIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex;
00703                   break;
00704       }
00705 }     
00706 
00707 void HandleItemsPanel( UINT16 usScreenX, UINT16 usScreenY, INT8 bEvent )
00708 {
00709       INT16 sIndex;
00710       UINT16 usQuantity;
00711       //Calc base index from scrolling index
00712       sIndex = eInfo.sScrollIndex * 2;
00713       //Determine if the index is in the first row or second row from mouse YPos.
00714       if( usScreenY >= 400 )
00715             sIndex++;
00716       //Add the converted mouse's XPos into a relative index;
00717       //Calc:  starting from 110, for every 60 pixels, add 2 to the index
00718       sIndex += ((usScreenX-110)/60) * 2;
00719       switch( bEvent )
00720       {
00721             case GUI_MOVE_EVENT:
00722                   if( sIndex < eInfo.sNumItems ) 
00723                   {
00724                         if( eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex != sIndex )
00725                               gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00726                         //this index will now highlight in yellow.
00727                         eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex = sIndex;
00728                   }
00729                   break;
00730             case GUI_LCLICK_EVENT:
00731                   if( sIndex < eInfo.sNumItems )
00732                   {
00733                         //this index will now highlight in red.
00734                         if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex != sIndex )
00735                               gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00736                         eInfo.sSelItemIndex = sIndex;
00737                         if( gfMercGetItem )
00738                         {
00739                               gfMercGetItem = FALSE;
00740                               gusMercsNewItemIndex = eInfo.pusItemIndex[ eInfo.sSelItemIndex ];
00741                               SetMercEditingMode( MERC_INVENTORYMODE );
00742                               ClearEditorItemsInfo();
00743                         }
00744                   }
00745                   break;
00746             case GUI_RCLICK_EVENT:
00747                   if( gfMercGetItem )
00748                   {
00749                         gfMercGetItem = FALSE;
00750                         gusMercsNewItemIndex = 0xffff;
00751                         SetMercEditingMode( MERC_INVENTORYMODE );
00752                         ClearEditorItemsInfo();
00753                   }
00754                   else if( sIndex < eInfo.sNumItems )
00755                   {
00756                         eInfo.sSelItemIndex = sIndex;
00757                         gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00758                         if( CountNumberOfEditorPlacementsInWorld( eInfo.sSelItemIndex, &usQuantity ) )
00759                         {
00760                               FindNextItemOfSelectedType();
00761                         }
00762                   }
00763                   break;
00764       }
00765 }
00766 
00767 void ShowItemCursor( INT32 iMapIndex )
00768 {
00769       LEVELNODE *pNode;
00770       pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pTopmostHead;
00771       while( pNode )
00772       {
00773             if( pNode->usIndex == SELRING )
00774                   return;
00775             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00776       }
00777       AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex, SELRING1 );
00778 }
00779 
00780 void HideItemCursor( INT32 iMapIndex )
00781 {
00782       RemoveTopmost( iMapIndex, SELRING1 );
00783 }
00784 
00785 BOOLEAN TriggerAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo )
00786 {
00787       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
00788       if( !GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
00789       {
00790             return FALSE;
00791       }
00792       while( pItemPool )
00793       {
00794             if( gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == SWITCH )
00795             {
00796                   return TRUE;
00797             }
00798             pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
00799       }
00800       return FALSE;
00801 }
00802 
00803 
00804 void AddSelectedItemToWorld( INT16 sGridNo )
00805 {
00806       OBJECTTYPE  tempObject;
00807       OBJECTTYPE *pObject;
00808       INVTYPE           *pItem;
00809       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
00810       INT32 iItemIndex;
00811       INT8 bVisibility = INVISIBLE;
00812       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
00813       IPListNode *pIPCurr, *pIPPrev;
00814       UINT16 usFlags;
00815 
00816       //Extract the currently selected item.
00817       SpecifyItemToEdit( NULL, -1 );
00818 
00819       //memset( &tempObject, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00820       if( eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS )
00821       {
00822             CreateKeyObject( &tempObject, 1, (UINT8)eInfo.sSelItemIndex );
00823       }
00824       else
00825       {
00826             CreateItem( eInfo.pusItemIndex[eInfo.sSelItemIndex], 100, &tempObject );
00827       }
00828       usFlags = 0;
00829       switch( tempObject.usItem )
00830       {
00831             case MINE:
00832                   if ( bVisibility == BURIED )
00833                   {
00834                         usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
00835                   }
00836                   break;
00837             case MONEY:
00838             case SILVER:
00839             case GOLD:
00840                   tempObject.bStatus[0] = 100;
00841                   tempObject.uiMoneyAmount = 100 + Random( 19901 );
00842                   break;
00843             case OWNERSHIP:
00844                   tempObject.ubOwnerProfile = NO_PROFILE;
00845                   bVisibility = BURIED;
00846                   break;
00847             case SWITCH:
00848                   if( TriggerAtGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00849                   { //Restricted to one action per gridno.
00850                         return;
00851                   }
00852                   bVisibility = BURIED;
00853                   tempObject.bStatus[0] = 100;
00854                   tempObject.ubBombOwner = 1;
00855                   if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 2 )
00856                         tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY;
00857                   else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 4 )
00858                         tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_2;
00859                   else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 6 )
00860                         tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_3;
00861                   else
00862                         tempObject.bFrequency = (INT8)(FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + (eInfo.sSelItemIndex-4) / 2);
00863                   usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
00864                   break;
00865             case ACTION_ITEM:
00866                   bVisibility = BURIED;
00867                   tempObject.bStatus[0] = 100;
00868                   tempObject.ubBombOwner = 1;
00869                   tempObject.bTrap = gbDefaultBombTrapLevel;
00870                   if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < PRESSURE_ACTION_ID )
00871                   {
00872                         tempObject.bDetonatorType = BOMB_REMOTE;
00873                         if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 2 )
00874                               tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY;
00875                         else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 4 )
00876                               tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_2;
00877                         else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 6 )
00878                               tempObject.bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_3;
00879                         else
00880                               tempObject.bFrequency = (INT8)(FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + (eInfo.sSelItemIndex-4) / 2);
00881                   }
00882                   else
00883                   {
00884                         tempObject.bDetonatorType = BOMB_PRESSURE;
00885                         tempObject.bDelay = 0;
00886                   }
00887                   ChangeActionItem( &tempObject, gbActionItemIndex );
00888                   tempObject.fFlags |= OBJECT_ARMED_BOMB;
00889                   if( gbActionItemIndex == ACTIONITEM_SMPIT )
00890                         Add3X3Pit( sGridNo );
00891                   else if( gbActionItemIndex == ACTIONITEM_LGPIT )
00892                         Add5X5Pit( sGridNo );
00893                   usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
00894                   break;
00895       }
00896 
00897       pObject = InternalAddItemToPool( &sGridNo, &tempObject, bVisibility, 0, usFlags, 0, &iItemIndex );
00898       if( tempObject.usItem != OWNERSHIP )
00899       {
00900             gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = (UINT8)(100 - giDefaultExistChance);
00901       }
00902       else
00903       {
00904             gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = 0;
00905       }
00906       
00907       pItem = &( Item[ pObject->usItem ] );
00908       if( pItem->usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
00909       {
00910             if (Random( 2 ))
00911             {
00912                   pObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = Magazine[ pItem->ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
00913             }
00914             else
00915             {
00916                   pObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = (UINT8) Random( Magazine[ pItem->ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize );
00917             }
00918       }
00919       else
00920       {
00921             pObject->bStatus[0] = (INT8)(70 + Random( 26 ));
00922       }
00923       if( pItem->usItemClass & IC_GUN )
00924       {
00925             if ( pObject->usItem == ROCKET_LAUNCHER )
00926             {
00927                   pObject->ubGunShotsLeft = 1;
00928             }
00929             else
00930             {
00931                   pObject->ubGunShotsLeft = (UINT8)(Random( Weapon[ pObject->usItem ].ubMagSize ));
00932             }
00933       }
00934 
00935       if( !GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
00936             Assert( 0 );
00937       while( pItemPool )
00938       {
00939             if( &(gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o) == pObject )
00940             {
00941                   fFound = TRUE;
00942                   //ShowSelectedItem();
00943                   break;
00944             }
00945             pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
00946       }
00947       Assert( fFound );
00948       
00949       gpItemPool = pItemPool;
00950 
00951       SpecifyItemToEdit( pObject, sGridNo );
00952 
00953       //Get access to the itempool.
00954       //search for a current node in list containing same mapindex
00955   pIPCurr = pIPHead;
00956       pIPPrev = NULL;
00957       while( pIPCurr )
00958       {
00959             pIPPrev = pIPCurr;
00960             if( pIPCurr->sGridNo == sGridNo )
00961             {
00962                   //found one, so we don't need to add it
00963                   gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPCurr;
00964                   return;
00965             }
00966             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
00967       }
00968       //there isn't one, so we will add it now.
00969       ShowItemCursor( sGridNo );
00970       if( pIPPrev )
00971       {
00972             pIPPrev->next = (IPListNode*)MemAlloc( sizeof( IPListNode ) );
00973             Assert( pIPPrev->next );
00974             pIPPrev = pIPPrev->next;
00975             pIPPrev->next = NULL;
00976             pIPPrev->sGridNo = sGridNo;
00977             gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPPrev;
00978       }
00979       else
00980       {
00981             pIPHead = (IPListNode*)MemAlloc( sizeof( IPListNode ) );
00982             Assert( pIPHead );
00983             pIPHead->next = NULL;
00984             pIPHead->sGridNo = sGridNo;
00985             gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPHead;
00986       }
00987 }
00988 
00989 void HandleRightClickOnItem( INT16 sGridNo )
00990 {
00991       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
00992       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
00993 
00994       if( gsItemGridNo == sGridNo )
00995       { //Clicked on the same gridno as the selected item.  Automatically select the next
00996             //item in the same pool.
00997             pItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
00998             if( !pItemPool )
00999             { //currently selected item was last node, so select the head node even if it is the same.
01000                   GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
01001             }
01002       }
01003       else if( !GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
01004       {
01005             //possibly relocate selected item to this gridno?
01006             return; 
01007       }
01008 
01009       gpItemPool = pItemPool;
01010 
01011       //set up the item pool pointer to point to the same mapindex node
01012       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01013       gpCurrItemPoolNode = NULL;
01014       while( pIPCurr )
01015       {
01016             if( pIPCurr->sGridNo == sGridNo )
01017             {
01018                   gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPCurr;
01019                   break;
01020             }
01021             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01022       }
01023       Assert( gpCurrItemPoolNode );
01024       SpecifyItemToEdit( &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o, gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01025 }
01026 
01027 extern void DeleteSelectedMercsItem();
01028 
01029 void DeleteSelectedItem()
01030 {
01031       SpecifyItemToEdit( NULL, -1 );
01032       //First, check to see if there even is a currently selected item.
01033       if( iCurrentTaskbar == TASK_MERCS )
01034       {
01035             DeleteSelectedMercsItem();
01036             return;
01037       }
01038       if( gpItemPool )
01039       { //Okay, we have a selected item...
01040             INT16 sGridNo;
01041             //save the mapindex
01042             if( gpItemPool->pNext )
01043             {
01044                   SpecifyItemToEdit( &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->pNext->iItemIndex ].o, gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01045             }
01046             sGridNo = gpItemPool->sGridNo;
01047             //remove the item
01048             if( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == ACTION_ITEM )
01049             {
01050                   if( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT )
01051                         Remove3X3Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01052                   else if( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
01053                         Remove5X5Pit( gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01054             }
01055             if( gpEditingItemPool == gpItemPool )
01056                   gpEditingItemPool = NULL;
01057             RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, gpItemPool->iItemIndex, 0 );
01058             gpItemPool = NULL;
01059             //determine if there are still any items at this location
01060             if( !GetItemPool( sGridNo, &gpItemPool , 0 ) )
01061             { //no items left, so remove the node from the list.
01062                   IPListNode *pIPPrev, *pIPCurr;
01063                   pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01064                   pIPPrev = NULL;
01065                   while( pIPCurr )
01066                   {
01067                         if( pIPCurr->sGridNo == sGridNo )
01068                         {     
01069                               if( pIPPrev ) //middle of list
01070                                     pIPPrev->next = pIPCurr->next;
01071                               else //head of list
01072                                     pIPHead = pIPHead->next;
01073                               //move the curr item pool to the next one.
01074                               if( pIPCurr->next )
01075                                     gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPCurr->next;
01076                               else
01077                                     gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPHead;
01078                               if( gpCurrItemPoolNode )
01079                               {
01080                                     GetItemPool( gpCurrItemPoolNode->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01081                                     Assert( gpItemPool );
01082                               }
01083                               //remove node
01084                               HideItemCursor( sGridNo );
01085                               MemFree( pIPCurr );
01086                               pIPCurr = NULL;
01087                               return;
01088                         }
01089                         pIPPrev = pIPCurr;
01090                         pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01091                   }
01092             }
01093       }
01094 }
01095 
01096 void ShowSelectedItem()
01097 {
01098       if( gpItemPool )
01099       { 
01100             gpItemPool->bVisible = INVISIBLE;
01101             gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].bVisible = INVISIBLE;
01102       }
01103 }
01104 
01105 void HideSelectedItem()
01106 {
01107       if( gpItemPool )
01108       {
01109             gpItemPool->bVisible = HIDDEN_ITEM;
01110             gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].bVisible = HIDDEN_ITEM;
01111       }
01112 }
01113 
01114 void SelectNextItemPool()
01115 {
01116       if( !gpCurrItemPoolNode )
01117             return;
01118 //remove the current hilight.
01119       if( gpItemPool )
01120       {
01121             MarkMapIndexDirty( gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01122       }
01123       
01124       //go to the next node.  If at end of list, choose pIPHead
01125       if( gpCurrItemPoolNode->next )
01126             gpCurrItemPoolNode = gpCurrItemPoolNode->next;
01127       else 
01128             gpCurrItemPoolNode = pIPHead;
01129       //get the item pool at this node's gridno.
01130       GetItemPool( gpCurrItemPoolNode->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01131       MarkMapIndexDirty( gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01132       SpecifyItemToEdit( &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o, gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01133       if( gsItemGridNo != -1 )
01134       {
01135             CenterScreenAtMapIndex( gsItemGridNo );
01136       }
01137 }
01138 
01139 void SelectNextItemInPool()
01140 {
01141       if( gpItemPool )
01142       {
01143             if( gpItemPool->pNext )
01144             {
01145                   gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01146             }
01147             else
01148             {
01149                   GetItemPool( gpItemPool->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01150             }
01151             SpecifyItemToEdit( &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o, gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01152             MarkWorldDirty();
01153       }
01154 }
01155 
01156 void SelectPrevItemInPool()
01157 {
01158       if( gpItemPool )
01159       {
01160             if( gpItemPool->pPrev )
01161             {
01162                   gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pPrev;
01163             }
01164             else
01165             {
01166                   GetItemPool( gpItemPool->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01167                   while( gpItemPool->pNext )
01168                   {
01169                         gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01170                   }
01171             }
01172             SpecifyItemToEdit( &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o, gpItemPool->sGridNo );
01173             MarkWorldDirty();
01174       }
01175 }
01176 
01177 
01178 void FindNextItemOfSelectedType()
01179 {
01180       UINT16 usItem;
01181       usItem = eInfo.pusItemIndex[ eInfo.sSelItemIndex ];
01182       if( usItem == ACTION_ITEM || usItem == SWITCH )
01183       {
01184             if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < PRESSURE_ACTION_ID )
01185             {     
01186                   INT8 bFrequency;
01187                   if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 2 )
01188                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY;
01189                   else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 4 )
01190                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_2;
01191                   else if( eInfo.sSelItemIndex < 6 )
01192                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_3;
01193                   else
01194                         bFrequency = (INT8)(FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + (eInfo.sSelItemIndex-4) / 2);
01195                   SelectNextTriggerWithFrequency( usItem, bFrequency );
01196             }
01197             else
01198             { 
01199                   SelectNextPressureAction();
01200             }
01201       }
01202       else if( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_KEY )
01203       {
01204             SelectNextKeyOfType( (UINT8)eInfo.sSelItemIndex );
01205       }
01206       else
01207       {
01208             SelectNextItemOfType( usItem );
01209       }
01210 }
01211 
01212 void SelectNextItemOfType( UINT16 usItem )
01213 {
01214       IPListNode *curr;
01215       OBJECTTYPE *pObject;
01216       if( gpItemPool )
01217       {
01218             curr = pIPHead;
01219             while( curr )
01220             { //skip quickly to the same gridno as the item pool
01221                   if( curr->sGridNo == gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo )
01222                   {
01223                         gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01224                         while( gpItemPool )
01225                         {
01226                               pObject = &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o;
01227                               if( pObject->usItem == usItem )
01228                               {
01229                                     SpecifyItemToEdit( pObject, gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01230                                     CenterScreenAtMapIndex( gsItemGridNo );
01231                                     return; //success! (another item in same itempool)
01232                               }
01233                               gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01234                         }
01235                         curr = curr->next;
01236                         break;
01237                   }
01238                   curr = curr->next;
01239             }
01240             while( curr )
01241             { //search to the end of the list
01242                   GetItemPool( curr->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01243                   while( gpItemPool )
01244                   {
01245                         pObject = &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o;
01246                         if( pObject->usItem == usItem )
01247                         {
01248                               SpecifyItemToEdit( pObject, gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01249                               CenterScreenAtMapIndex( gsItemGridNo );
01250                               return; //success! (found another item before reaching the end of the list)
01251                         }
01252                         gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01253                   }
01254                   curr = curr->next;
01255             }
01256       }
01257       curr = pIPHead;
01258       while( curr )
01259       { //search to the end of the list
01260             GetItemPool( curr->sGridNo, &gpItemPool, 0 );
01261             while( gpItemPool )
01262             {
01263                   pObject = &gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].o;
01264                   if( pObject->usItem == usItem )
01265                   {
01266                         SpecifyItemToEdit( pObject, gWorldItems[ gpItemPool->iItemIndex ].sGridNo );
01267                         CenterScreenAtMapIndex( gsItemGridNo );
01268                         return; //success! (found first item in the list)
01269                   }
01270                   gpItemPool = gpItemPool->pNext;
01271             }
01272             curr = curr->next;
01273       }
01274 }

01467 
01468 UINT16 CountNumberOfItemPlacementsInWorld( UINT16 usItem, UINT16 *pusQuantity )
01469 {
01470       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
01471       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
01472       INT16 num = 0;
01473       *pusQuantity = 0;
01474       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01475       while( pIPCurr )
01476       {
01477             GetItemPool( pIPCurr->sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
01478             while( pItemPool )
01479             {
01480                   if( gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == usItem )
01481                   {
01482                         num++;
01483                         *pusQuantity += gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
01484                   }
01485                   pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
01486             }
01487             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01488       }
01489       return num;
01490 }
01491 
01492 UINT16 CountNumberOfItemsWithFrequency( UINT16 usItem, INT8 bFrequency )
01493 {
01494       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
01495       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
01496       UINT16 num = 0;
01497       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01498       while( pIPCurr )
01499       {
01500             GetItemPool( pIPCurr->sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
01501             while( pItemPool )
01502             {
01503                   if( gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == usItem &&
01504                           gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.bFrequency == bFrequency )
01505                   {
01506                         num++;
01507                   }
01508                   pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
01509             }
01510             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01511       }
01512       return num;
01513 }
01514 
01515 UINT16 CountNumberOfPressureActionsInWorld()
01516 {
01517       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
01518       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
01519       UINT16 num = 0;
01520       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01521       while( pIPCurr )
01522       {
01523             GetItemPool( pIPCurr->sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
01524             while( pItemPool )
01525             {
01526                   if( gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == ACTION_ITEM &&
01527                           gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.bDetonatorType == BOMB_PRESSURE )
01528                   {
01529                         num++;
01530                   }
01531                   pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
01532             }
01533             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01534       }
01535       return num;
01536 }
01537 
01538 UINT16 CountNumberOfEditorPlacementsInWorld( UINT16 usEInfoIndex, UINT16 *pusQuantity )
01539 {
01540       UINT16 usNumPlacements;
01541       if( eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_TRIGGERS )
01542       {     //find identical items with same frequency 
01543             INT8 bFrequency;
01544             if( usEInfoIndex < PRESSURE_ACTION_ID )
01545             {
01546                   if( usEInfoIndex < 2 )
01547                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY;
01548                   else if( usEInfoIndex < 4 )
01549                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_2;
01550                   else if( usEInfoIndex < 6 )
01551                         bFrequency = PANIC_FREQUENCY_3;
01552                   else
01553                         bFrequency = (INT8)(FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + (usEInfoIndex-4) / 2);
01554                   usNumPlacements = CountNumberOfItemsWithFrequency( eInfo.pusItemIndex[usEInfoIndex], bFrequency );
01555                   *pusQuantity = usNumPlacements;
01556             }
01557             else
01558             {
01559                   usNumPlacements = CountNumberOfPressureActionsInWorld();
01560                   *pusQuantity = usNumPlacements;
01561             }
01562       }
01563       else if( eInfo.uiItemType == TBAR_MODE_ITEM_KEYS )
01564       {
01565             usNumPlacements = CountNumberOfKeysOfTypeInWorld( (UINT8)usEInfoIndex );
01566             *pusQuantity = usNumPlacements;
01567       }
01568       else
01569       { 
01570             usNumPlacements = CountNumberOfItemPlacementsInWorld( eInfo.pusItemIndex[ usEInfoIndex], pusQuantity );
01571       }
01572       return usNumPlacements;
01573 }
01574 
01575 UINT16 CountNumberOfKeysOfTypeInWorld( UINT8 ubKeyID )
01576 {
01577       ITEM_POOL *pItemPool;
01578       IPListNode *pIPCurr;
01579       INT16 num = 0;
01580       pIPCurr = pIPHead;
01581       while( pIPCurr )
01582       {
01583             GetItemPool( pIPCurr->sGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 );
01584             while( pItemPool )
01585             {
01586                   if( Item[ gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem ].usItemClass == IC_KEY )
01587                   {
01588                         if( gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.ubKeyID == ubKeyID )
01589                         {
01590                               num++;
01591                         }
01592                   }
01593                   pItemPool = pItemPool->pNext;
01594             }
01595             pIPCurr = pIPCurr->next;
01596       }
01597       return num;
01598 }
01599 
01600 void DisplayItemStatistics()
01601 {
01602       BOOLEAN fUseSelectedItem;
01603       INT16 usItemIndex;
01604       UINT16 pItemName[SIZE_ITEM_NAME];
01605       INVTYPE *pItem;
01606       
01607       if( !eInfo.fActive )
01608       {
01609             return;
01610       }
01611       
01612       //If there is nothing else currently highlited by the mouse, use the selected item.
01613       fUseSelectedItem = eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex == -1 || eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex == eInfo.sSelItemIndex;
01614       
01615       SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
01616       SetFontForeground( (UINT8)(fUseSelectedItem ? FONT_LTRED : FONT_YELLOW) );
01617 
01618       //Extract all of the item information.
01619       if( !eInfo.pusItemIndex )
01620             return;
01621       usItemIndex = eInfo.pusItemIndex[ fUseSelectedItem ? eInfo.sSelItemIndex : eInfo.sHilitedItemIndex ];
01622       pItem = &Item[ usItemIndex ];
01623       LoadItemInfo( usItemIndex, pItemName, NULL );
01624 
01625       mprintf( 50 - StringPixLength( pItemName , SMALLCOMPFONT )/2, 403, pItemName );
01626       mprintf( 2, 410, L"Status Info Line 1");
01627       mprintf( 2, 420, L"Status Info Line 2");
01628       mprintf( 2, 430, L"Status Info Line 3");
01629       mprintf( 2, 440, L"Status Info Line 4");
01630       mprintf( 2, 450, L"Status Info Line 5");
01631 }
